text: Susan Yap Sulit (born November 2, 1965) is a Filipina politician from the 2nd district of Tarlac, Philippines. She is currently serves as a Governor of Tarlac. She was first elected as Governor of the province in 2016 and was re- elected in 2019. Yap is the second child of former representative Jose “Aping” Yap, who died of prostate cancer on March 1, 2010. ==References== * * * * ==External links== *Province of Tarlac Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tarlac Category:1965 births Category:University of the Philippines alumni Category:Nationalist People's Coalition politicians
title: Susan Yap
